title: Seminar for Science and Math Tutors
description: Concepts of teaching and learning as it relates to roles as K-12 grade science and math tutors and/or classroom assistants. Restricted to students who are Teaching Assistants in Math and Science (TeAMS) tutors or Volunteers in Out of School Time (VOST). Participation in public schools requires mandated fingerprint clearance. 1 activity.
prerequisites: MATH 142; PHYS 132, PHYS 133, PHYS 122, PHYS 123, PSC 102 or PSC 103; and consent of instructor
